description:
In this video we take look at some awesome accessories that we personally use when traveling with our Handheld gaming PC like the Steam Deck, Legion Go Rogue Ally X or any other handheld console, these will also work with android phones like the Samsung galaxy S24 Ultra and DeX,
From a Foldout travel keyboard that has a built in trackpad to a portable OLED monitor!

Ugreen 100W 10Ft USB Type C Cable: https://amzn.to/3BOozLX
JSUX 65W Battery Bank: https://amzn.to/4eP2Lyj
ProtoArc Foldable Keyboard with Touchpad: https://amzn.to/4dSr50T
OLED INNOCN Portable Monitor: https://amzn.to/3Y7oeLQ
RAPIQUE Bluetooth Wireless Mouse: https://amzn.to/4dXNudg
AOHI 100W USB C Charger GaN+: https://amzn.to/3UgJpK6

Buy The ASUS ROG Ally X Here: https://howl.me/cmvWv0bom4B
Buy The Legion Go Here: https://howl.me/cmBmTHVRaAe
